sentences.sContent: Sort out all your bills, receipts, invoices, and expenses as quickly as possible and keep detailed accounts.
sentences.sCn: 将你的帐单、收据、发票和花销尽快整理好，并做好详细的账目。

trans.tranOther: If you sort out a group of things, you separate them into different classes, groups, or places, for example so that you can do different things with them.
